text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn How about we have the real death toll of the coronavirus? Anyone who dies,no matter from what, if they just test positive of the virus, then it's considered a coronavirus death. Let's do that with the flu now. From now on anyone positive of flu dies it's a flu death, millions
